Title: Establishes an economic grant program for the Second Avenue Subway construction project area
Summary: Establishes an economic development grant program for the Second Avenue Subway construction project area; defines micro business.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
LawCode: Add ยง16-bb, UDC Act; add ยง131-a, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to establishing a Second Avenue Subway construction economic development grant program; and to amend the economic development law, in relation to the definition of micro business
